Articles.Content: I\'ve decided to get some mods, and I don\'t know how to install plugins. HALP.

First of all, you need the full version of the game, plugins don\'t work in the free demo.

You download most of the plugins as a zip file. Inside this file you will usually find folders called \'Parts\' \'Plugins\' and \'Source\' (sometimes they are inside a folder that has the same name as the mod you are installing).

If you are not a coder, you will not need the \'Source\' folder - it is the source code for the plugin, put there so that people can see there is no malicious code in the plugin.

What you need to do is to copy the \'parts\' and \'plugins\' folders into your KSP game folder, answer \'yes\' if the computer asks you to overwrite existing files/folders and that should be it.
